contents.title: Giffyglyph's Brutal Barbarian
contents.blurb:
You are a barbarian, a force of primal power and rage. There are few problems you can't solve with a strong arm and a sharp axe. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of barbarian will you choose to be?

Are you a brute, charging into battle with furious abandon and bloodlust? Are you a survivor, tough and hardy, using your honed skills and knowledge to thrive in the wilds? Or are you a leader, decisive and commanding as you threaten enemies and rally allies?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Brutal Barbarian introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
New class resources—use your barbarian brutality to help dominate the battlefield.
Brutal maneuvers—crush your enemies in combat with new, martial actions.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your barbaric specialty from the very first level.
Recover your strength with a long rest.
Variant dials to customise your playstyle.
